column5: I am assuming it is the same Ben Beattie here on OFC.   Either that or there is another NW Ontario walleye machine with the same name.  Good Article.
haha, guilty Gramace.  That's me.  Thanks for the kind words.  I haven't even seen it yet
Congrats Ben!!  I'll have to check it out!!  Sinker
WTG Ben....wow...that means i've met a real live famous person!
Atta boy Ben. I knew you could do it! Looking forward to reading your story.
I'll definitely have to read it, congrat's Ben!
....Ah, a nice little feather in your cap. Congrats.
Nice work Ben. When are you getting you own fishing show? I want to be a guest lol  -R-
Honestly fellas, thanks a lot for the kind words.
